duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the day-to-day operations of a shared-use, commercial kitchen housing multiple restaurant operators.
Support restaurant operators, upkeep the facility, and maintain food safety compliance at all times.
Receive supplier deliveries, manage inventory, and ensure facility cleanliness and organization.
Onboard new merchants and employees, provide technical assistance to merchants, and ensure food safety compliance.
Assist merchants with expediting completed orders, fulfill ice cream orders, and execute occasional DoorDash Kitchen tests.
Establish and maintain effective working relationships and make decisions quickly while delegating responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of previous experience in the food and beverage industry.
Working knowledge of MS Office, G Suite, Salesforce and Point-of-Sale Software.
Ability to communicate in Spanish or Portuguese.
